title: South Jersey Kung Fu Qigong & Tai Chi School
text: Detailed Description Health, Longevity, Weight Loss!! Non-Strenuous Qigomg Learn Qigong a mind body discipline practiced by millions worldwide - shown to help about 200 diseases. Requires little strength, flexibility, or coordination, making it ideal for seniors and the physically disadvantaged. Easier to learn and practice than Tai Chi, Yoga or Pilates. For more information or to register, call 848 222-1687 or visit http://kungfutaichiqigong.com Tai Chi for Seniors Health and Self Defense Bored of practicing the same short forms without really knowing what you are doing? Learn classical Tai Chi for seniors, health and self defense: long slow Yang form, original slow and fast moving Yang form, exciting martial push hands and feet (punches, kicks, throws, locks, etc., not useless push hands), exciting 2-men sparring forms and weapons. Learn not only how to aid health problems with single or combinations of postures according to Chinese medicine, but also their deadly effects (Dim Mak) when used for self defense. For more information or to register, call 848-222-1687 or visit http://kungfutaichiqigong.com Self Defense for Women, Men; Seniors. Mantis Kung Fu Defend yourself, even if you are weak, by using the opponent's strength against him by studying Mantis Kung Fu, like Bruce Lee. Since it is not a sport, all ranges, distances, and situations in fighting are considered: (1) punching, kicking, striking, clawing; attacking nerves and acupoints, (2) classical Chinese weapons in all combat situations (armed and unarmed); (3) Chin Na: seizing techniques such as joint locks, throwing, pinching etc. For more information or to register, call 848-222-1687 or visit http://kungfutaichiqigong.com Actions Flag Clear flag Create a Filter Print Message Show Message Status View Message Source ----
